games.name: Among Us
games.description: Interactive, deduction-style game. You work as either a crewmate or imposter aboard a spaceship. Crewmates win by completing tasks, imposters win by killing crewmates. Free with ads on iOS/Android, paid for PC

games.name: Skribbl.io
games.description: Drawing game (one player draws using their mouse and everyone guesses in a chat)

games.name: Board Game Arena
games.description: Collection of board games including Solo (Uno clone with some new rules)

games.name: Webopoly
games.description: Monopoly-style game where all the properties are web companies!

games.name: Quiplash
games.description: Party game. Everyone answers prompts and the answers with the most votes win! $5.49 on Steam (also exists on other platforms)

games.name: Hanabi
games.description: A place to play Hanab online, a cooperative card game of logic and reasoning

games.name: Set with Friends
games.description: Card game where the goal is to find triplets of cards following a pattern as quickly as possible. Can join other people's rooms!

games.name: Enchambered
games.description: Online escape room puzzles to work through with friends! Offers pay-what-you-want and free puzzles.

games.name: Avalon
games.description: Social deduction game (somewhat similar to Werewolf). The more players the better!

games.name: Codewords
games.description: Online unofficial Codenames-based game. Each team works together with their Codemaster to uncover their code words.
